title: Evolution
description: Warning: Revised/Reedited Version. For Mature Adult Audiences. Contains language and actions some may deem offensive. Sexually explicit content. Ménage – MMF.In book one of Ternion: Jasmine's life has had its rough spots, but nothing like she is faced with after obtaining a financial windfall. Well that's what she thought until she attends a wrestling match with her best friend. One evening out has the potential to send her life spiraling, leaving her with a choice to make. Kai and Zane are professional wrestlers who share a bond that goes beyond the arena. A bond which sent them on a mission to find the one woman who would complete them. When they finally spot her in the crowd, it was as if the struggles they had gone through, the searching, had finally paid off. Now they only have to hope she accepts them for who they truly are to fill a void they've felt for years. However, when Jasmine's best friend disappears, she falls apart, leaving them reluctant to tell her the truth. A secret that could chase her away, causing them to lose her forever. Will Jasmine take the chance, embrace life's unexpected surprises, or will she send them away, never to know what the future could hold?
author: Zana King
